text: This is about the town in the West Midlands, England. Tipton is a town in the Sandwell borough of the West Midlands, England, with a population of around 47,000. Tipton is located about halfway between Birmingham and Wolverhampton. It is a part of the West Midlands conurbation, and is a part of the Black Country. Category:Towns in the West Midlands (county)
title: Tipton
